column4: whatever problem this is it's just outrageous.  attempting to change anything results in it reverting
stop it
this  channel is ubuntu support, we can help you with ubuntu, but try to keep calm and just state your problem clearly
has this ever worked
where did you get macbuntu  ?
soruceforce, it's a very popular transformation pack
ok - so as a high level summary, you had a working ubuntu cssm, downloading an external package, now the cssm package doesn't work, yes/no ?
ok, so if you contact the support team from the soruceforge project page, then can explain what it changes and how, they will know how to undo it
already done.
ask the macbuntu support team what it changes, then we can work out how to revery
ok, so have they responded yet
no
have the macbuntu support team responded ?
re-install then if you can't wait
I have told you how to install rar
sorry - not you
it seems crazy that you would install a software package from an unknown source, not-knowing how it works then complain that it changes things
it wasn't unknown I've installed and uninstalled the package a number of times.
then you should know what it changes and how to fix it
good look with the re-install, or support fom the macbuntu guys, I suggest we leave it there
It's not an attack, we just don't support that package, so I suggest you contact/wait for response from the macbuntu guys, or re-install
please stop asking about it, we won't suppot the changes that package has made
it's fortunate that ubuntu is so easy to reinstall.
I dont care, install it or don't
